page.title: 08ATTITUDES.
page.content: During the month of JUNE 1985 P7 made a visit to AILSA SHIPYARD.The class were met by the manager and his assistant.Everyone was given an orange safety helmet which we put on our heads to hoots of laughter from all around. We all felt very important.We were split into two groups and set off for our first real look at industry.We saw huge cranes welders,engineers,designers and platers employed in creating ships to carry the name of TROON throughout the world.Fiona Cameron,expressed the desire to become an engineer in the future and was most surprised to learn that in 1985 female engineers were not as yet employed at AILSA.The class enjoyed their visit and were invited back to see the launch of the ship under construction.A great day out.
